original_title: 本当にあった怖い投稿映像 超恨み
overview: The 2nd installment of the most terrifying video collection, filled with grudges. "Mountain Climbing", "Graveyard", "Ruins", "Multilevel Parking Lot", "Coin Laundromat", "Athletics", "Talk Show", "Karaoke Box", "Barbecue", "Athletic Festival", and other scary footage that hides in casual everyday life.
tagline: Along with the resentment of grudges...
title: Really Scary Posted Video Super Grudge
